Summary Quality Engineer knowledge  
•	Quality roles in product development life cycle phases. 
•	Quality measurements and product readiness (e.g. Bugzilla). 
•	Excellent knowledge of all testing levels (Manual, Automated). 
•	Excellent knowledge of all testing Types (Functional and Non Functional). 
•	Excellent knowledge of AB Testing. 
•	Excellent knowledge of Bug Tracking and Reporting. 
• Ability to verify project documents. 
•	Excellent reporting skills  
•	Verify and follow-up on bugs fixes. 
•	Thorough knowledge of development methodologies especially agile. 
•	Identify and generate required Test Data. 
•	Performance test (e.g. Testing, WAS, Jmeter, Badboy). 
•	Security test (e.g. XSS, XSRF, and SQL Injection). 
•	SEO Knowledge and Internet marketing.  
 
 
Quality Engineer skills: 
•	Analyze business requirements.  
•	Create Test plan describing the scope of the test, test approach, exit criteria entry criteria and project schedule.  
•	Design and implement automation and manual test cases. 
•	Estimate time needed for the test. 
•	Run different type of testing smoke test, regression, functional, security, load, stress, performance and non functional test. 
•	Write the descriptive bug with severity and priority. 
•	Design, write and execute automated test script. 
•	Analyze test results and provide clear steps to help resolve the issues.
